Posts.Content: Taleena, I am sending you my strong prayers and positive thoughts. I know the anxiety of waiting for any test results can be nerve racking. But if we all pray together, our prayers will be answered. I believe in you and that you will be OK.
Posts.Title: Please just say a little prayer....
